Name: Dark Lore Mysteries: The Hunt For Truth
About the game: A violent murder has awoken a small town with a troubled past. A town where evil was part of their history, fear was in their daily lives. They thought that chapter was over with. But has it returned? Features: • Investigate a string of murders. • Solve puzzles crafted to stop you. • Meet townsfolk and hear their stories. • Search for relevant clues and use them to catch a killer.
